name: Blobby Hell [Newbies Game Jam (2022 - 2)]
description:
Introduction

This is our entry for the Newbies Game Jam (2022 - 2), as well as our very first game.

The theme was  Dead = progress, which inspired us to create a game based of the concept where the level is invisible but parts of it can appear through blood when the player dies. 

Any feedback is appreciated!

Controls

[A][D] => Move left/right

[Space] => Jump

[R] => Restart level

Credits Visuals

Character, Portal & UI - Bloodyman2103

Fonts

Soft Marshmallow - Galdino Otten

Music & Sound FX

Blood Splat SoundFX - yanvv

Background Music - yanvv

Jump Sound FX - Bloodyman2103

Portal Sweep Sound FX - Mixkit.co

Coding

Bloodyman2103 & yanvv
